articles.author: Katya Witney
articles.title: Josh Tongue: All you need to know about England’s newest Test recruit, the first to dismiss Steve Smith in County Championship - Wisden
articles.description: Josh Tongue has been added to England's Test squad to take on Ireland next week (June 1-4) - here's everything you need to know about England's newest fast-bowling recruit.
articles.content:
Josh Tonguehas been added to England’s Test squad to take on Ireland next week (June 1-4) – here’s everything you need to know about England’s newest fast-bowling recruit.
